findings.Lower Thorax: Tiny bilateral pleural effusions. The lung bases are clear. Heart size normal. No pericardial effusion.
findings.Liver: Mild hepatic steatosis with no concerning solid or cystic lesions.
findings.Biliary: No intra- or extra-hepatic duct dilatation; gallbladder unremarkable.
findings.Pancreas: Fatty atrophy with mild edematous change in the neck and proximal body; 10 mm cystic lesion in the neck consistent with a side-branch IPMN.
findings.Spleen: Normal in size and signal characteristics; no focal lesions.
findings.Adrenal Glands: Normal in size and signal characteristics; no focal lesions.
findings.Kidneys: Normal in size and signal characteristics; no lesions.
findings.Vasculature: Patent abdominal aorta and proximal mesenteric vessels.
findings.Osseous and Soft Tissue Structures: Normal signal characteristics; no concerning osseous lesions.
